contents:
同样的话可以还给你。你用你说的话去理解下脱支党，就不会这么人身攻击了。还有，你可以参考我以前留言，我...

Personal attacks? I just don't want to babysit anyone in a forum LOL. Please act like an adult OK?
So you want to impress the immigration officer with your tragic past? I don't think he will 'understand' you or listen to your holy bullshit though.
